summary: A young woman returning from a renaissance fair survives a car accident, but much to her family's horror, the accident damages her brain and she develops blatantly promiscuous and childlike behavior.
cast: Jill Clayburgh|Mike Farrell|Missy Crider|Cyia Batten|Michael Mantell|Robert Pine|Cordelia Richards|Grayson McCouch|Louise Fletcher|Chris Conrad|Kenny Johnson|David Grant Wright|Jason Sutliff|Douglas Rowe|Carl Gilliard|Sandra Phillips|William Francis McGuire|Silas Weir Mitchell|Redge Bourgette|James A. Hazelwood|Rena Johns|Mel Hampton|Dusty Bill Brinsfield|Jenjer Vick Robin|Christopher Rogers|Kitty Kreidler
title: Laberinto de la mente
